Whenever I try to log in using the widget in the side-bar I get redirected to the login page and asked to enter credentials again. Not sure if this is related to bug 622737.

Steps:
1. Go to http://quality.mozilla.org
2. Try to log in using the widget on the right
3. Redirect to the login page
4. Enter credentials again and log in

If I log out and log back in it works via the widget. However, if my cache/cookies are cleared I go through the double login again.
